name: PointLike
description: Common interface for points with manipulation methods. Extends PointData to add operations for copying, comparison and setting values. ```ts // Basic point manipulation const point: PointLike = new Point(10, 20); point.set(30, 40); // Copy between points const other = new Point(); point.copyTo(other); // Compare points const same = point.equals(other); // true ```

properties.name: copyFrom
properties.description: Copies x and y from the given point ```ts const point1: PointLike = new Point(10, 20); const point2: PointLike = new Point(30, 40); point1.copyFrom(point2); console.log(point1.x, point1.y); // 30, 40 ```

properties.name: copyTo
properties.description: Copies x and y into the given point ```ts const point1: PointLike = new Point(10, 20); const point2: PointLike = new Point(0, 0); point1.copyTo(point2); console.log(point2.x, point2.y); // 10, 20 ```

properties.name: equals
properties.description: Returns true if the given point is equal to this point ```ts const point1: PointLike = new Point(10, 20); const point2: PointLike = new Point(10, 20); const point3: PointLike = new Point(30, 40); console.log(point1.equals(point2)); // true console.log(point1.equals(point3)); // false ```

properties.name: set
properties.description: Sets the point to a new x and y position. If y is omitted, both x and y will be set to x. ```ts const point: PointLike = new Point(10, 20); point.set(30, 40); console.log(point.x, point.y); // 30, 40 point.set(50); // Sets both x and y to 50 console.log(point.x, point.y); // 50, 50 ```
